description: Can you say tough and soft at the same time? Because that's what you get with this outdoor-ready pant. Take them climbing or wear them on the trail, just don't be surprised if people stop you to ask where they can get their 90s fix too. And while the OG style was tough to top, this remixed version adds an adjustable waistband and Earth-friendly craftsmanship too.
name: Prana Mojave Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
